name: Volt
description: Volt is a specialized oscilloscope-themed robot designed for combat situations. With its vibrant orange box body, it catches the eye as it stands tall and sturdy. Its soldier-themed buttons give it a militaristic appearance, hinting at its disciplined nature. The arms and legs of Volt are designed with hands facing downwards, ready to engage in precise and agile movements. Its red and black screen displays intricate waveforms and data, making it a reliable and efficient companion for any technical task. To protect itself during missions, Volt is equipped with a sturdy helmet addon, ensuring its safety in the line of duty.
